tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Kirthana for my daughter. She was very patient while conversing with my child and cleary explained the problem. I was extremely happy with the way she handled the kid. No matter the number of doubts,  she patiently answered. Throughout the treatment,  she kept enquiring about my child's comfort. 
Dr. Rakesh too helped clear my doubts and offered his expertise. A very beautiful experience and I can say that my daughter will look forward to her dentist visits. 

Thank u Dr. Kirthana and Dr. Rakesh. Really impressed with your service.
reply_text: Thanks a ton.. Our pleasure treating your little princess

review:
I very much appreciate Doctor's initiative and courtesy to call me up soon after he sensed some change in my appointment schedule. I could clearly read their care and value for their patients than money, when i discussed over phone about my dental problems. Moreover, I am impressed to receive a follow up email. Thank you doc.

Gomathi Varadhan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very good doctor **** *** ** ********* *** understanding on patients requirements and problem. She clearly explained the problems and its remedy. 
I would recommend her  and their clinic with 100% satisfaction. They are really A Family dentist....

Regards

Vijay

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been coming for dental cleaning for the past few years to Dr. Kirthana. She explains patiently the issues and the fixes, gives dental care advice and when treating, she is considerate to the patient and meticulous about the work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Explanation of issue and good service at the clinic,doctor was so friendly root canal treatment was done without feeling any pain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor has clarified all the questions my mother had patiently and showed the various possible procedures that is applicable in pictures. Given appropriate final recommendation.Thank you, Dr Kirtana

I had a wonderful experience during the process and the dentist work is just an art.they took the work with utmost sincerity and dedication and helped me to get a wonderful aesthete teeth structure.I strongly recommend kirthana roa in Chennai,thiruvamiyur.

The  experience with Dr Kirthana was absolutely fine. The treatment and care taken was of extremely high standard and definitely left a strong positive impact on me . I would have no reservation in recommendeing Dr. Kirtana to others. I have had no pain during and post treatment.

*Really fantastic.
*The way she explained the things made me to start my treatment without further thinking. 
*Smooth handling and very friendly with patients.
*She was prompt and always present whenever patient needs (apart from regular visit)
*Now I have completed my treatment and its been a year passed.I didn't find any issues till date.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The team of Dr. Rakesh and Dr. Kirtana Rao at My  Family Dentist are EXCELLENT. 

They both are Friendly, dedicated and above all they explain the problem so well that it removes the scary feeling I had about visiting a dentist.

I felt at home and was treated as a family member in the Clinic.
Doctor did the treatment with utmost care. She was very polite and kind with patients and also one of the experienced dentists I met.
The doctor was extremely responsive and very accommodative for handling my mothers tooth extraction and dentures placement.

Very friendly and good . Not very pushy and patient at her work.
Would like to go back for my problems
Ms.kirthana have given me a rough idea about what can be done and explained the process . Pricing would be mid level on normal scale.
It was purely professional approach. She went about her work explaining each step and completed the procedure with least difficulty for me.

Good. knows her job and does it well. Young , ************* ******** Keen in working  as a dentist,  keeping appointment and time for patients.  very helpfull in guiding when we got doubts even beyond her scope of knowledge as Dentist.

It was an pleasant experience. No exaggerated stuffs. Reason and treatment for the ailment is explained properly. Communiation w.r.t appointments were done properly.I would recommend people to reach out her for dental issues. Communicat
reply_text: Thank you.. Was a pleasure treating you...

review: Wonderful experience!she is very dedicated n one of the bests dentists in Thiruvanmiyur region of Chennai!highly professional!
Excellent work done by Dr. Kirthana. Surely I would recommend anyone to go with Dr. Kirthana and Dr Rakesh for any dental treatment.

My wife was treated by both Dr Rakesh and Dr Kirthana. They were both very professional and my wife felt comfortable with both of them doing her root canal treatment. I highly recommend both Doctors for their treatment, and professionalism.
They gave me clear information about my teeth and what are the possibilities of outcome after operation and thanks alot for all these informations :)
We had consulted dr for my 6yr old daughter.  Doctor builded our confidence within minutes.  She had a parental approach dealing with kids.  Affordable & proffesional.
Very useful. Her intraction and feedback to the dental issues are commendable. Overall a very nice experience.

Very good hospitality provided.  Ms Kirthana was very polite and made us easy with the tooth extraction. 
Overall excellent.
